title: Valkyria.explains
body:
I'm supposed to take you to Valhalla as you are dead. But I'm afraid I can't do that

[[Monrjiall.Choices]]

title: Monrjiall.Choices
body:
[[What do you mean "you can't"?|Valkyria.Orders]]
[[I didn't want to go to Valhalla anyway|Valkyria.Destiny]]
[[You wretched witch! I will kill you!|Valkyria.Sarcasm]]

title: Valkyria.Orders
body: Unfortunately, no order has been given to take you to Valhalla and I suspect I know why

title: Valkyria.Destiny
body: But you must! It is your destiny to reach the afterworld after dying in battle!

title: Valkyria.Sarcasm
body: Well, this is going nowhere, fast
